If AM hands over his function to another team member, he should be informed about key dates for month closure by AM. Revenue under a project won't be recognized if time journals are not completed for all employees working on the project. Please be sure that all project team reports hours according to the UPSA resource plan and there are no unapproved/mistaken overtimes reported.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Expense Tracking\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"At the end of the month all reimbursable expenses and contractor invoices should be confirmed by Account Manager for accruals/invoicing. The CTC expense report (contractor invoice) can be billed to the customer/accrued if it is in “APPROVED” / “CLOSED” status and marked as “BILLABLE”. After issuing invoices Revenue Group marks appropriate expenses as billed in CTC.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Year to Date (YTD) Report Confirmation\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"After the month closure revenue YTD report is sent by responsible BM to AM for their confirmation.
